skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Alert
skill.description: For an agent to know how to alert a set of populated areas. Populated areas are visited in the order of the list.

link.name: reach
link.description: To go to a populated area.

link.name: alert
link.description: To enact the decision to "alert" a populated area.

feedback.name: alerted
feedback.description: Sent upon completion of the simulation action.

feedback.name: notAlerted
feedback.description: Sent each time a 'PopulatedArea' cannot be alerted.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all 'populatedAreas' have been visited, even of once of them haven't been alerted.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "populatedAreas" is empty (no element to act on).
